title: [day] 08/08/08
content:
Well, nothing, I would like to send my greetings to the people on Typophile today.

 [‹ Going to California](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122055800/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47461 "Go to previous forum topic") [LCP MA Typo/Graphic Studies ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122055800/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3931 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content:
May I extend my Greetings to All Typophiles with Flowers

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122055800im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/FL_logo1_6161.gif)

Triple eight greetings to you, Alessandro! I better start working on my food lecture :-)

ChrisL

_[if man is 5 [3x]  
then the devil is 6 [5x]  
then god is 7 [3x]](http://web.archive.org/)_

this monkey’s gone to heaven

So the question becomes: who is 8, and what are they doing to celebrate their day?

Eight must be the oil companies who are celebrating the windfall profits they are making these days :-)

ChrisL

8 is the pro-255 Characters who deserve the ww21 and 8x225=1800 Flowers?!
